spec_scores.notes: Spec is exceptionally clear with well-defined objectives, context, and 12 concrete functional requirements. All requirements include testable examples. Comprehensive edge cases, user scenarios, and constraints. Scope perfectly matches feature description with clear boundaries (Out of Scope section). No ambiguities that would block implementation.

plan_scores.notes: Plan proposes optimal recursive descent parser approach with clear rationale for design decisions. Comprehensive coverage of tokenization, parsing, and evaluation algorithms with pseudocode. Addresses all 12 spec requirements with explicit mapping. Includes complexity analysis (O(n) time, O(d) space), extensibility considerations, and detailed testing strategy. Implementation path is crystal clear and highly feasible.

implementation_scores.notes: All 115 tasks are perfectly atomic with exact file paths. Each task is clear and actionable. TDD cycles are consistently applied (write test → verify fail → implement → verify pass). Complete coverage of all plan phases and spec requirements with explicit R01-R12 mapping. Logical sequencing with clear phase dependencies. No parallel opportunities marked (appropriate for sequential TDD workflow).
